column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////What an amazing experience! The waitress was extremely helpful about what to do around town
column2: and what to order on the menu. The Malnati salad is the best salad I've EVER had. I would recommend it! I was sad I didn't get a large! I ordered their Malnati Chicago classic deep dish pizza medium
column4: this place. If you want good service
column7: then this is the place to go!!
